typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Retailer_code as string,
		Product_number as string,
		Date as string,
		Quantity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> transformedata1
source(output(
		Retailer_code as string,
		Product_number as string,
		Date as string,
		Quantity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> input2
transformedata1, input2 join(transformedata1@Product_number == input2@Product_number,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Retailer_code as string,
		Product_number as string,
		Date as string,
		Quantity as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Retailer_code = transformedata1@Retailer_code,
		Product_number = transformedata1@Product_number,
		Date = transformedata1@Date,
		Quantity = transformedata1@Quantity,
		Retailer_code = input2@Retailer_code,
		Product_number = input2@Product_number,
		Date = input2@Date,
		Quantity = input2@Quantity
	)) ~> sink1
